text: How Many Outcomes? The number of outcomes depends on how many students are in the class. If there are 30 students, there are 30 possible outcomes, because you could ask any one of them to leave. L VA BT TR ATE ) S There can be many possible events depending on the conditions you set. For example: * "Astudent wearing a blue shirt leaves" is one event. ® "Astudent sitting in the front row leaves” is another event. ® "Astudent whose name starts with ‘A’ leaves" is yet another event.
